property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 blue Vegeta among them with an energy cost of 3 or less and play it in Rest Mode. Then, place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: If all of your energy is blue, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand and Battle Area by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 blue Vegito among them with an energy cost of 8 or less and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Union-Potara 3BB: Son Goku and Vegeta. Dual Attack. Critical. Auto: When this card attacks twice in the same turn, it gains Double Strike for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main: Return this card to its owner's hand. Auto: When this card attacks, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 Trunks: Youth among them with 15000 or less power and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate Main: Return this card to its owner's hand. Auto When this card attacks, you may reveal 1 Son Goten from your hand. If you do so, choose up to 1 opponent Battle Card with an energy cost of 3 or less and KO that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Union-Fusion 2GG: Son Goten and Trunks: Youth. Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, if you have a Son Goten in your Drop Area, draw 2 cards. If you have a Trunks: Youth in your Drop Area, choose up to 1 opponent Battle Card and KO that card.
